title: JOIN ME FOR POOL PARTY

embed.description: Welcome to Team Up Week! League's better with a party, so from June 15-21, team up with friends and earn points by winning games in five-player premades or sending gifts to friends both new and old. These points pool together to unlock levels of rewards for the whole community to enjoy.

body: Hello I am a League Of Legends player from OCE I would like you to join me in my journey throughout the pool party I hope you friend me I'm sneezee plz note that it is a lower case letter for s and I'm an oce player plz join me I will give rp codes 2 all people who participate

replies.body: YO unfortunately I have no code sorry about that but I'll give You secret stuff u can do with RIOT
Heeyyyyyy ;) sneezee if you're keen to play the odd ARAM count me in!
ill join if u want me xD
i would join u for code or not
PLZ PLZ PLZ PLZ PLZ PLZ JOIN
